title: Building a House
description: Houses look very different on the outside, but most builders follow the same steps to build them. Most houses have foundations, floors, walls, and roofs. Building a House provides students with a realistic look at the basic home-building process. The book can also be used to teach students how to sequence events and to recognize and use nouns.
meta: builders, foundation, pipes, steps, switches, wires
